$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/AllFollowU.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/AllFollowUpItems
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/AllFollowU.creator: jpjerkins
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/AllFollowU.text:
\import [all[shadows]prefix:title[$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Macros/FollowUp]] [[BulkMoveFollowUpItems|$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/BulkMoveFollowUpItems]] Move To: <> <$let currentTiddler=<> targetFolder={{!!text}}> !! Follow-up Folders <$list filter="[list[$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/FollowUpFolders]]"> <$let folder={{!!title}} targetFolderTiddler=<>> <$list filter="[tag[FollowUpItem]field:follow-up-folder!tag[Done]first[1]]"> !!! <> <$button> <$list filter="[field:follow-up-foldertag[FollowUpItem]!tag[Done]]"> <$action-setfield follow-up-folder=<>/> Move all
    <$list filter="[tag[FollowUpItem]field:follow-up-folder!tag[Done]]">
  • <$link $tiddler={{!!title}}>{{!!title}} <$list filter="[tag{!!title}tag[TodoNextAction]!tag[Done]sort[created]nth[1]]">
    {{!!title}}

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Done.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Done
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Done.creator: jpjerkins
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Done.text:
!! [[Done]] <$button> <$list filter="ToDo TodoAction +[tagging[]tag[Done]!tag[$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Today]sort[title]]"> <$let todo=<> actionFilter={{{[tag]}}}> <$list filter="[is[current]!has[text]!filter]"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!title}} /> Delete Vanilla Done To-Dos <$list filter="ToDo TodoAction Done +[tagging[]tag[Done]!tag[$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Today]sort[title]]">
<$button> <$action-listops $tiddler={{!!title}} $field="tags" $subfilter="-Done" /> Not Done
<$let todo=<> actionFilter={{{[tag[TodoAction]tag]}}}> <$button> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!title}} /> Delete <$list filter="[is[current]has[text]tag[ToDo]!filter]"><$button><$action-listops $tiddler={{!!title}} $field="tags" $subfilter="-ToDo" />-ToDo <$list filter="[is[current]has[text]tag[TodoAction]!filter]"><$button><$action-listops $tiddler={{!!title}} $field="tags" $subfilter="-TodoAction" />-TodoAction <$list filter="[is[current]has[text]!tag[ToDo]!tag[TodoAction]tag[Done]!filter]"><$button><$action-listops $tiddler={{!!title}} $field="tags" $subfilter="-Done" />-Done <$list filter="[is[current]!tag[ToDo]filter]"> $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/DoneToDoCleanup
<$list filter="[is[current]has[text]]"> <$link to={{!!title}}>__{{!!title}}__ <$list filter="[is[current]!has[text]]"> <$link to={{!!title}}>{{!!title}}
<$list filter="[is[current]has[text]]">
<$transclude tiddler=<> mode=block />

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Macros/Sho.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Macros/ShowTodayList
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Macros/Sho.text:
\define doneActions() <$action-setfield $field="today-actual-points" $value={{!!today-potential-points}} /><$action-listops $tags="Done"/> \define notDoneActions() <$action-deletefield $field="today-actual-points"/><$action-listops $tags="-Done"/> \define showTodayList(totalPotentialPoints, totalActualPoints, currentScore) !! Today! <$list filter="[tag[Today]!nsort[today-potential-points]]"> <$let doneTagCount={{{ [list[!!tags]join[;]] }}} currentTodo=<> hasProject={{{ [kin::from:tag[Initiative]count[]] }}} hasGoal={{{ [kin::from:tag[$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/IdentityStatements]count[]multiply[2]] }}} todoType={{{ [add] }}} > <$checkbox filter="[list[!!tags]]" checked="Done" checkactions=<> uncheckactions=<>> {{!!today-potential-points}} <$list variable="result" filter="[compare:number:gteq[2]]"> <$link overrideClass="goal-link" tiddler=<> ><> <$list variable="result" filter="[compare:number:eq[1]]"> <$link overrideClass="project-link" tiddler=<> ><> <$list variable="result" filter="[compare:number:eq[0]]"> <$link tiddler=<> ><>
Possible: $totalPotentialPoints$
Actual: $totalActualPoints$
Score: $currentScore$ \end

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/TagTodoAct.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/TagTodoActionsWithActionDateAsDone
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/TagTodoAct.text: ! Tiddlers to Tag !!//Apply the tag <$tiddler tiddler="Done"><$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate"/> to the following tiddlers// <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]tag[TodoAction]!tag[Done]!field:action-date[]sort[]]"> <$checkbox tag="Done"> <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/>

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/TechSmiths.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/TechSmithsEraTiddlers
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/TechSmiths.text: //List all tiddlers created after [[Team Guardians - Purpose, Roadmap - 2019-06-07]] and before [[Nebula's Team Kickoff|2021-09-23 - Team Kickoff]]// ! Tiddlers to Tag !!//Apply the tag <$tiddler tiddler="TechSmiths"><$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate"/> to the following tiddlers// <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]untagged[]!search:title[$]days:created[-998]!days:created[-159]sort[]]"> <$checkbox tag="TechSmiths"> <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/>

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Templates/.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Templates/TodayCardDraggableTemplate
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Templates/.creator: jpjerkins
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Templates/.text:
<$let
 todayIndex={{{ [list[TodayCandidate]allbefore<currentTiddler>count[]] }}}
 todayOrdinal={{{ [<todayIndex>add[1]] }}}
 todayPoints={{{ [<todayCount>subtract<todayIndex>] }}}
 hasProject={{{ [kin::from:<currentTiddler>tag[Initiative]count[]] }}}
 hasGoal={{{ [kin::from:<currentTiddler>tag[$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/IdentityStatements]count[]multiply[2]] }}}
 todoType={{{ [<hasGoal>add<hasProject>] }}} >
<<todayPoints>>
<$button>
<$action-listops $tags="-TodayCandidate"/>
<$action-listops $tiddler="TodayCandidate" $filter="[tag[TodayCandidate]]"/>
Remove
</$button>
<$list variable="result" filter="[<todoType>compare:number:gteq[2]]">
<$link overrideClass="goal-link" tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> ><<currentTiddler>></$link>
</$list>
<$list variable="result" filter="[<todoType>compare:number:eq[1]]">
<$link overrideClass="project-link" tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> ><<currentTiddler>></$link>
</$list>
<$list variable="result" filter="[<todoType>compare:number:eq[0]]">
<$link tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> ><<currentTiddler>></$link>
</$list>
</$let>

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/To Do.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/To Do
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/To Do.text:
!! [[To-Do|$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/To Do]]

!!! //What Scares You?//

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/new-button-caption" tag="input" default="" />
<$button>
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-button-caption}} tags="ToDo"/>
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-button-caption" />
Add
</$button>

{{$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ToDoList}}

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Today.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Today
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Today.caption: Today
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Today.creator: jpjerkins
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Today.text:
\define scoreTitle() $(today)$ - Daily Score \define weekTitle() $(year)$-w$(week)$ - Weekly Score \import [[$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Macros/ShowTodayList]] <$let totalPotentialPoints={{{ [tag[Today]get[today-potential-points]sum[]] }}} totalActualPoints={{{ [tag[Today]get[today-actual-points]sum[]] }}} currentScore={{{ [dividemultiply[100]round[]] }}} today=<> > <>' totalActualPoints:'<>' currentScore:'<>' >>

<$button> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> $overwrite="yes" tags="DailyScore" totalPotentialPoints=<> totalActualPoints=<> score=<> weekOfYear=<> /> ▷ D <$button> <$let totalWeekPotentialPoints={{{ [tag[DailyScore]field:weekOfYearget[totalPotentialPoints]sum[]] }}} totalWeekActualPoints={{{ [tag[DailyScore]field:weekOfYearget[totalActualPoints]sum[]] }}} totalWeekScore={{{ [dividemultiply[100]round[]] }}} > <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> $overwrite="yes" tags="WeeklyScore" totalPotentialPoints=<> totalActualPoints=<> totalScore=<> /> ▷ W <$button> <$list filter="[tag[Today]!tag[TodayCandidate]sort[today-potential-points]]"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags="TodayCandidate -Today" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=TodayCandidate $field=list $filter="[tag[TodayCandidate]!nsort[today-potential-points]]" /> Remix <$button> <$list filter="[tag[Today]]"> <$action-listops $field="tags" $subfilter="-Today -FollowUpItem" /> Done!

!! Candidates <$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/new-today-candidate" tag="input" default="" /> <$button> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-today-candidate}} tags="ToDo"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-today-candidate" /> + <$button> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-today-candidate}} tags="ToDo TodayCandidate"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-today-candidate" /> +C <$button> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-today-candidate}} tags="Initiative $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/MyInitiatives" /> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/state/new-today-candidate}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-today-candidate" /> +P <$let todayCount={{{ [list[TodayCandidate!!list]count[]] }}}> <> <$list filter="[tag[TodayCandidate]first[]]"> <$button> <$list filter="[list[TodayCandidate]]"> <$let todayIndex={{{ [list[TodayCandidate]allbeforecount[]] }}} todayPoints={{{ [subtract] }}}> <$action-listops $tags="Today -TodayCandidate" /> <$action-setfield today-potential-points=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="TodayCandidate" $field="list" $value="" /> Commit! [[Scores|$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/TodayScores]] | [[Home|$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Home]] | [[Screenshot|$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/TodayScreenshot]]

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ToDoList.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ToDoList
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ToDoList.creator: jpjerkins
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ToDoList.text:
<$list filter="[tag[ToDo]!tag[Waiting]!tag[Done]!tag[FollowUpItem]!tag[TodayCandidate]!tag[$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Today]sort[title]]"> <$list filter="[is[current]has[text]]"> <$link to={{!!title}}>__{{!!title}}__ <$list filter="[is[current]!has[text]]"> <$link to={{!!title}}>{{!!title}} <$list filter="[tag{!!title}tag[TodoAction]!tag[Done]sort[created]nth[1]]"> {{!!title}}
<$button> <$action-listops $tiddler={{!!title}} $field="tags" $subfilter="+[append[TodayCandidate]]" /> <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Today" $filter="[tag[TodayCandidate]]"/> Today | <$button> <$action-listops $tiddler={{!!title}} $field="tags" $subfilter="+[append[Done]]" /> Done <$reveal state="!!todo-action-box-state" type="nomatch" text="prompt-for-todo-action"> | <$button set="!!todo-action-box-state" setTo="prompt-for-todo-action"> Waiting <$reveal state="!!todo-action-box-state" type="match" text="prompt-for-todo-action"> | <$button> <$action-setfield waiting=<> /> <$action-listops $field="tags" $subfilter="+[append[Waiting]]" /> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-todo-action}} $savetitle="$:/state/new-todo-action" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/new-todo-action}} action-date=<> /> <$action-listops $tiddler={{$:/state/new-todo-action}} $field="tags" $subfilter="[{!!title}] +[append[TodoAction Done]]" /> <$action-setfield $field="todo-action-box-state" $value="" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-action" /> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} <$button> <$action-setfield $field="todo-action-box-state" $value="" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-action" /> {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}}
Why: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-action" tag="input" default="" />

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/Bulk.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/BulkMoveFollowUpItems
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/Bulk.creator: jpjerkins
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/Bulk.text:
\import [all[shadows]prefix:title[$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Macros/FollowUp]] Move From: <> Move To: <> <$let currentTiddler=<> sourceFolder={{!!text}} currentTiddler=<> targetFolder={{!!text}}> <$button> <$list filter="[field:follow-up-foldertag[FollowUpItem]!tag[Done]]"> <$action-setfield follow-up-folder=<>/> Move all
    <$list filter="[field:follow-up-foldertag[FollowUpItem]!tag[Done]]">
  • <$button> <$action-setfield follow-up-folder=<>/> Move {{!!title}}

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/Conv.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/ConvertNextActionsToActions
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/Conv.text:
!! Set action-date Field on Done TodoNextActions <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]tag[TodoNextAction]tag[Done]field:action-date[]sort[]]"> <$set name="actionDate" filter="[is[current]get[modified]format:date[ddd, MM/0DD]]" select="0"> <$button> <$action-setfield $field="action-date" $value=<>/> Set action-date to <> <$link to=<> />
!! Next * $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/RenameTags from ''~TodoNextAction'' to ''~TodoAction''

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/Done.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/DoneToDoCleanup
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/Done.text:
<$list variable="todo" filter="[tag[Done]!tag[ToDo]!tag[TodoAction]]">

<$link to=<> />

<$button> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> Del <$list variable="doneFlag" filter="[tag[Done]]"> <$button> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="tags" $subfilter="-Done" /> -Done <$list variable="waitingFlag" filter="[tag[Waiting]]"> <$button> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="tags" $subfilter="-Waiting" /> -Waiting
<$transclude tiddler=<> />
    <$list filter="[kin:tags:to!match]">
  • <$button> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> Del <$list variable="doneFlag" filter="[is[current]tag[Done]]"> <$button> <$action-listops $tiddler={{!!title}} $field="tags" $subfilter="-Done" /> -Done <$list variable="waitingFlag" filter="[is[current]tag[Waiting]]"> <$button> <$action-listops $tiddler={{!!title}} $field="tags" $subfilter="-Waiting" /> -Waiting <$link /> {{!!text}}

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/Rena.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/RenameFields
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/Rena.text:
\define oldToNewFilter() [tag[$(tag)$]!field:$(oldField)$[]field:$(newField)$[]] \define deleteOldFilter() [tag[$(tag)$]!field:$(oldField)$[]!field:$(newField)$[]] |!Search tag: | <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/RenameFields/tag" tag="input" type="text"/> | |!Old field name: | <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/RenameFields/old" tag="input" type="text"/> | |!New field name: | <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/RenameFields/new" tag="input" type="text"/> | !! Copy Old to New <$let tag={{$:/temp/RenameFields/tag}} oldField={{$:/temp/RenameFields/old}} newField={{$:/temp/RenameFields/new}} filter=<> >
    <$list filter=<> >
  • <$set name="newValue" tiddler={{!!title}} field=<> > <$button> <$action-setfield $field=<> $value=<>/> Copy Old to New <$link $to={{!!title}}>{{!!title}}
!! Delete Old <$let tag={{$:/temp/RenameFields/tag}} oldField={{$:/temp/RenameFields/old}} newField={{$:/temp/RenameFields/new}} filter=<> >
    <$list filter=<> >
  • <$button> <$action-deletefield $field=<>/> Remove Old Field <$link $to={{!!title}}>{{!!title}}

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/Rena.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/RenameTags
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Utils/Rena.text:
//From http://tw5magick.tiddlyspot.com/ // This great trick was shown to the tiddlywiki google group by [[Alberto Molina|https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/tiddlywiki/OCntQ79DuwM]]. I enhanced it a bit. |!Search tag: | <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/RenameTags/search" tag="input" type="text"/> | |!Replace by: | <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/RenameTags/replace" tag="input" type="text"/> | --- <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" state="$:/temp/RenameTags/replace"> !First step !!//Apply the tag <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/temp/RenameTags/replace}}><$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate"/> to the following tiddlers// <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]tag{$:/temp/RenameTags/search}!tag{$:/temp/RenameTags/replace}sort[created]]"> <$checkbox tag={{$:/temp/RenameTags/replace}}> <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/>
<$reveal type="nomatch" text="" state="$:/temp/RenameTags/search"> !Second step !!//Remove the tag <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/temp/RenameTags/search}}><$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate"/> from the following tiddlers// <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]tag{$:/temp/RenameTags/search}tag{$:/temp/RenameTags/replace}sort[created]]"> <$checkbox tag={{$:/temp/RenameTags/search}}> ~~<$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/>~~

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/new-goal-item" tag="input" default="" /> <$button> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-goal-item}} tags=<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-goal-item" /> +~ToDo <$button> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-goal-item}} tags=<> /> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/state/new-goal-item}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-goal-item" /> +Project

\define NewNotesTags() [[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define NewNotesLabel() $(newNotesLabelDate)$ - $(initiativeLabel)$ <$list filter="[is[current]tag[Initiative]]"> <$let initiativeTag={{!!title}} initiativeLabel={{!!title}} newNotesLabelDate=<> > <$list filter="[is[current]tag[Parked]]"> <$button> <$action-listops $tags="-Parked" /> !Park <$list filter="[is[current]!tag[Parked]]"> <$button> <$action-listops $tags="Parked" /> Park! !! To-Do <$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/new-button-caption" tag="input" default="" /> <$button> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-button-caption}} $savetitle="$:/state/new-button-caption" /> <$action-listops $tiddler={{$:/state/new-button-caption}} $field="tags" $subfilter="[{!!title}] +[append[ToDo]]" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-button-caption" /> Add <$button> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-button-caption}} $savetitle="$:/state/new-button-caption" /> <$action-listops $tiddler={{$:/state/new-button-caption}} $field="tags" $subfilter="[{!!title}] +[append[ToDo TodayCandidate]]" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-button-caption" /> Candidate <$list variable="firstToDo" filter="[tagtag[ToDo]!tag[Waiting]!tag[Done]!tag[FollowUpItem]first[1]]">

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTempla.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTemplate/ProjectActionBar
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTempla.text:
\define newProjectTodoTags() [[$(currentTiddler)$]] ToDo \define newProjectCandidateTags() [[$(currentTiddler)$]] ToDo TodayCandidate \define closeProjectActions() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="text" $value="" /> \end <$let actionMenuState={{{ [all[current]addprefix[$:/temp/]addsuffix[/action-menu-state]] }}} > <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="prompt-for-todo-action">
<$button> <$action-listops $tags="Parked" /> <> P! <$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/new-todo" default="" tag="input" /> <$button> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-todo}} tags=<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-todo" /> <> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} <$button> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-todo}} tags=<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-todo" /> <> T! <$button> <> {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}}

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTempla.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTemplate/ProjectActionBarHamburger
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTempla.text:
\define openProjectActions()
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<actionMenuState>> $field="text" $value="prompt-for-todo-action" />
\end
\define closeProjectActions()
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<actionMenuState>> $field="text" $value="" />
\end

<$let actionMenuState={{{ [all[current]addprefix[$:/temp/]addsuffix[/action-menu-state]] }}} >
	<$reveal state=<<actionMenuState>> type="nomatch" text="prompt-for-todo-action">
		<$messagecatcher $tm-navigate=<<openProjectActions>> >
			<$link>☰</$link>
		</$messagecatcher>
	</$reveal>
	<$reveal state=<<actionMenuState>> type="match" text="prompt-for-todo-action">
		<$messagecatcher $tm-navigate=<<closeProjectActions>> >
			<$link>×</$link>
		</$messagecatcher> |
	</$reveal>
</$let>

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTempla.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTemplate/QuestionsListFooter
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTempla.text:
\define newQuestionTiddlerMacro(question parentTiddler) <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="$question$ - $parentTiddler$" $savetitle="$:/state/new-question-title" /> \end <$list filter="[is[current]tag[QuestionsList]]"> <$set name="questionsListTitle" value={{!!title}}> New Question: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/new-question" tag="input" default="" /> <$button> <$macrocall $name="newQuestionTiddlerMacro" question={{$:/state/new-question}} parentTiddler={{!!title}} /> <$action-listops $tiddler={{$:/state/new-question-title}} $field="tags" $subfilter="[{!!title}] +[append[Question]]" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/new-question-title}} $field="question" $value={{$:/state/new-question}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-question" /> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} <$button> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-question" /> {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}} <$list filter="[tagtag[Question]!tag[Answered]first]">

Questions

<$list filter="[tagtag[Question]!tag[Answered]]">
{{!!question}}
<$button> <$action-listops $field="tags" $subfilter="+[append[Answered]]" /> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} <$button> <$action-navigate /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" param={{currentTiddler}} /> Edit
<$transclude mode="block" />
<$list filter="[tagtag[Question]tag[Answered]first]">

Answered Questions

<$list filter="[tagtag[Question]tag[Answered]]">
{{!!question}}
<$button> <$action-listops $field="tags" $subfilter="-Answered" /> {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}} <$button> <$action-navigate /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" param={{currentTiddler}} /> Edit
<$transclude mode="block" />

\define newDatedCandidateLabel() $(newCandidateLabel)$ $(newCandidateLabelDate)$ \define newDatedCandidateTags() $(currentTags)$ ToDo TodayCandidate \import [[$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Macros/FollowUpActionsSelect]]
<$let actionMenuState={{{ [all[current]addprefix[$:/temp/]addsuffix[/action-menu-state]] }}} > <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="prompt-for-todo-action">
<$button set=<> setTo=""> <$action-listops $tags="TodayCandidate" /> T! <$let currentTags={{!!tags}} newCandidateLabel={{!!title}} newCandidateLabelDate=<> > <$button set=<> setTo=""> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> tags=<> /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags="-FollowUpItem" /> T,,dt,,! <$button set=<> setTo=""> <$action-listops $tags="Done" /> ✔ <$button> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!title}} /> 🗑 <<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="text" $value=""/>' >>

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTempla.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTemplate/TodoActionBarHamburger
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTempla.text:
<$let actionMenuState={{{ [all[current]addprefix[$:/temp/]addsuffix[/action-menu-state]] }}} >
	<$reveal state=<<actionMenuState>> type="nomatch" text="prompt-for-todo-action">
		<$button set=<<actionMenuState>> setTo="prompt-for-todo-action">
			☰
		</$button>
	</$reveal>
	<$reveal state=<<actionMenuState>> type="match" text="prompt-for-todo-action">
		<$button set=<<actionMenuState>> setTo="">
			×
		</$button> |
	</$reveal>
</$let>

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTempla.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTemplate/TodoFooter
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTempla.creator: jpjerkins
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/ViewTempla.text:
\import [all[shadows]prefix:title[$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/Macros/FollowUp]] <$list filter="[is[current]tag[ToDo]]"> <$set name="currentTiddlerTitle" value={{!!title}}>
<$list filter="[is[current]!tag[Done]]"> <$button> <$action-listops $tiddler={{!!title}} $field="tags" $subfilter="+[append[Done]]" /> <$action-listops $tags="+[remove[FollowUpItem]]"/> <$action-deletefield follow-up-folder /> Done <$list filter="[is[current]tag[Done]]"> <$button> <$action-listops $tiddler={{!!title}} $field="tags" $subfilter="-Done" /> Not Done <$reveal state="!!todo-waiting-box-state" type="nomatch" text="prompt-for-todo-waiting"> | <$button set="!!todo-waiting-box-state" setTo="prompt-for-todo-waiting"> Waiting <$reveal state="!!todo-waiting-box-state" type="match" text="prompt-for-todo-waiting"> | <$button> <$action-setfield waiting=<> /> <$action-listops $field="tags" $subfilter="+[append[Waiting]]" /> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-todo-action}} $savetitle="$:/state/new-todo-action" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/new-todo-action}} action-date=<> /> <$action-listops $tiddler={{$:/state/new-todo-action}} $field="tags" $subfilter="[{!!title}] +[append[TodoAction Done]]" /> <$action-setfield $field="todo-waiting-box-state" $value="" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-action" /> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} <$button> <$action-setfield $field="todo-waiting-box-state" $value="" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-action" /> {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}} Why: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-action" tag="input" default="" /> <$reveal state="!!todo-not-waiting-box-state" type="nomatch" text="prompt-for-todo-not-waiting"> | <$button set="!!todo-not-waiting-box-state" setTo="prompt-for-todo-not-waiting"> Not Waiting {{!!waiting}} <$reveal state="!!todo-not-waiting-box-state" type="match" text="prompt-for-todo-not-waiting"> | <$button> <$action-setfield waiting=<> /> <$action-listops $field="tags" $subfilter="-Waiting" /> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-todo-action}} $savetitle="$:/state/new-todo-action" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/new-todo-action}} action-date=<> /> <$action-listops $tiddler={{$:/state/new-todo-action}} $field="tags" $subfilter="[{!!title}] +[append[TodoAction Done]]" /> <$action-setfield $field="todo-not-waiting-box-state" $value="" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-action" /> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} <$button> <$action-setfield $field="todo-not-waiting-box-state" $value="" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-action" /> {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}} Why: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-action" tag="input" default="" /> Follow Up folder: <<$action-listops $tags="+[remove[Done]]"/>' >> <$button> <$action-listops $tags="+[remove[FollowUpItem]]"/> <$action-deletefield follow-up-folder /> Clear <$list filter="[is[current]!tag[TodayCandidate]]"> <$button> <$action-listops $tags="TodayCandidate" /> Today! <$list filter="[is[current]tag[TodayCandidate]]"> <$button> <$action-listops $tags="-TodayCandidate" /> !Today
New Next Action: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-next-action" tag="input" default="" /> <$button> <$action-setfield waiting=<> /> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-todo-next-action}} $savetitle="$:/state/new-todo-next-action" /> <$action-listops $tiddler={{$:/state/new-todo-next-action}} $field="tags" $subfilter="[{!!title}] +[append[TodoAction]]" /> <$action-setfield $field="todo-next-action-box-state" $value="" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-next-action" /> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} <$button> <$action-setfield $field="todo-next-action-box-state" $value="" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-next-action" /> {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}} <$list variable="topNextAction" filter="[tagtag[TodoAction]!tag[Done]sort[created]first[1]]">

Outstanding Next Actions

<$list filter="[tagtag[TodoAction]!tag[Done]sort[created]]">
<$button> <$action-listops $field="tags" $subfilter="+[append[Done]]" /> <$action-setfield $field="action-date" $value=<>/> Done <$link>{{!!title}}
<$list variable="topActivity" filter="[tag{!!title}tag[TodoAction]sort[created]first[1]]">

Activities

<$list filter="[tag{!!title}tag[TodoAction]tag[Done]!sort[created]]">
<$button> <$action-listops $field="tags" $subfilter="-Done" /> Not Done {{!!action-date}} <$link>{{!!title}}

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/WaitingLis.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/WaitingList
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/WaitingLis.creator: jpjerkins
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/WaitingLis.text:
<$list filter="[tag[ToDo]tag[Waiting]!tag[Done]!tag[FollowUpItem]sort[waiting]]">
<$list filter="[is[current]has[text]]"> <$link to={{!!title}}>__{{!!title}}__ <$list filter="[is[current]!has[text]]"> <$link to={{!!title}}>{{!!title}} <$list filter="[tag{!!title}tag[TodoAction]!sort[created]first[]]"> <$view field="created" format="date" template="MM/DD"/> {{!!title}}
<$button> <$action-listops $tiddler={{!!title}} $field="tags" $subfilter="+[append[Done]]" /> Done <$reveal state="!!todo-action-box-state" type="nomatch" text="prompt-for-todo-action"> | <$button set="!!todo-action-box-state" setTo="prompt-for-todo-action"> Not Waiting {{!!waiting}} <$reveal state="!!todo-action-box-state" type="match" text="prompt-for-todo-action"> | <$button> <$action-setfield waiting=<> /> <$action-listops $field="tags" $subfilter="-Waiting" /> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/new-todo-action}} $savetitle="$:/state/new-todo-action" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/new-todo-action}} action-date=<> /> <$action-listops $tiddler={{$:/state/new-todo-action}} $field="tags" $subfilter="[{!!title}] +[append[TodoAction Done]]" /> <$action-setfield $field="todo-action-box-state" $value="" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-action" /> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} <$button> <$action-setfield $field="todo-action-box-state" $value="" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/new-todo-action" /> {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}}

$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/What IS Th.title: $:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/What IS This Thing?
$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/What IS Th.text:
Welcome to the inside of Phil's head!

!! Finding Information
You can find information in any of the following ways:

* ''Search''
** Just type into the search box.  Title matches will be listed first; full-text matches will be listed below.
** Good things to search for:
*** "PROD", "INTG", etc.
*** Dates in "2019-03-14" format
*** Technology names - "~ElasticSearch", "Kafka", "Powershell", etc.
* ''Recent'' - Click this tab, and it'll show you the most-recently edited tiddlers by edit time order.

!! Getting Started Fast
* Click the {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} icon on the top-right of any tiddler to edit it
* Click the {{$:/core/images/new-button}} icon above the search box to create a new tiddler
* The {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} icon on the top-right of any tiddler has a bunch of cool things you can do.
** Example: The "new here" option will create a new tiddler tagged with the current tiddler's title.  That makes it easy to track a train-of-thought path, while keeping individual thoughts separate.
* Don't forget to download [[Tiddly Desktop|https://tiddlywiki.com/#TiddlyDesktop]]
* And, as always, there's http://tiddlywiki.com :-)

!! ~TiddlyWiki [[Core Concepts|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Concepts]]
* Always remember that [[TiddlyWiki likes small, fine-grained tiddlers|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Philosophy%20of%20Tiddlers]].  It's optimized to find and render them quickly.  Most of the UI (including everything in the menu/nav bar on the right) is composed of small tiddlers.  How small?  Every button in the UI is its own tiddler, and has a tag saying it belongs in that place.  So if you ever find yourself adding to a tiddler that's taller than one page, consider breaking it up and transcluding it in (see the  icon in the editor's toolbar).
* There are [[many|https://tiddlywiki.com/#list-links%20Macro]] [[ways|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Contents]] to [[list|https://tiddlywiki.com/#ListWidget]] and [[render|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Transclusion]] tiddlers based on a filter.  Playing with this will give you your first taste of ~TiddlyWiki's true power.  Example: [[$:/plugins/pjerkins/phil-work/To Do]]
* There are [[many|https://tiddlywiki.com/#CheckboxWidget]] [[widgets|https://tiddlywiki.com/#ButtonWidget]] that manipulate [[tiddlers|https://tiddlywiki.com/#ActionCreateTiddlerWidget]] and [[their fields|https://tiddlywiki.com/#ActionListopsWidget]].  These expose yet another level of ~TiddlyWiki's capabilities.
